TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IConfigurationSectionHandler

summary.span: 处理对特定的配置节的访问。

span.span: Handles the access to certain configuration sections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > .NET Framework 2.0 及更高版本中已弃用 。 is deprecated in .NET Framework 2.0 and above. 但由于它是在内部使用的，因此已将其保留。But, because it is used internally, it has been kept. 可以在[如何：使用 IConfigurationSectionHandler 创建自定义配置节](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/07f68a3f-2920-4665-a824-47bda744e662)中找到一个示例。You can find an example at [How to: Create Custom Configuration Sections Using IConfigurationSectionHandler](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/07f68a3f-2920-4665-a824-47bda744e662). 如果使用上面的示例，请使用 .NET Framework 版本1.0 或1.1 生成它。If you use the previous example, please build it with the .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1. 在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 及更高版本中，必须改为从 类派生以实现相关的配置节处理程序。In .NET Framework version 2.0 and above, you must instead derive from the class to implement the related configuration section handler. 可以在[如何：使用 ConfigurationSection 创建自定义配置节](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/febaca98-c727-4017-95ed-82e2fb6cf234)中找到一个示例。You can find an example at [How to: Create Custom Configuration Sections Using ConfigurationSection](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/febaca98-c727-4017-95ed-82e2fb6cf234). 类的实例必须是线程安全的，并且是无状态的。Instances of the class must be thread safe and stateless. 方法必须可同时从多个线程调用。The method must be callable from multiple threads simultaneously. 此外， 方法生成的配置对象必须是线程安全的，并且是不可变的。Furthermore, the configuration object generated by the method must be thread safe and immutable. 由于配置对象由配置系统进行缓存，因此不需要修改 方法的父参数，这一点很重要。Because the configuration objects are cached by the configuration system, it is important not to modify the parent argument to the method. 例如，如果 的返回值只是对父级的小修改，则必须对父项（而不是原始副本）进行实际修改。For example, if the return value of is only a small modification of the parent, actual modifications must be made on a clone of the parent, not the original.

MemberSignature.Value: public object Create (object parent, object configContext, System.Xml.XmlNode section);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Create(object parent, object configContext, class System.Xml.XmlNode section) cil managed
Public Function Create (parent As Object, configContext As Object, section As XmlNode) As Object
public: System::Object ^ Create(System::Object ^ parent, System::Object ^ configContext, System::Xml::XmlNode ^ section);
abstract member Create : obj * obj * System.Xml.XmlNode -> obj

returns.span: 创建的节处理程序对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的实例必须是线程安全的，并且是无状态的。Instances of the class must be thread safe and stateless. 方法必须可同时从多个线程调用。The method must be callable from multiple threads simultaneously. 此外， 方法生成的配置对象必须是线程安全的，并且是不可变的。Furthermore, the configuration object generated by the method must be thread safe and immutable. 由于配置对象由配置系统进行缓存，因此不需要将父自变量修改为 。Because the configuration objects are cached by the configuration system, it is important not to modify the parent argument to . 例如，如果 的返回值只是对父级的小修改，则必须对父项（而不是原始副本）进行实际修改。For example, if the return value of is only a small modification of the parent, actual modifications must be made on a clone of the parent, not the original.
